actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require country of origin labeling for processed food items.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require country of origin labeling for processed food items. (Includes as a covered item under such Act.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require country of origin labeling for processed food items.
